entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLinker should special case facade assemblies #90469
  • Official build is failing on OneLocBuild step #90466
    8.0.0
  • C# Collections for docs #90463
  • [NativeAOT] Tests failing `nativeaot/SmokeTests/StackTraceMetadata/StackTraceMetadata/StackTraceMetadata.sh` on tvos-arm64 #90460
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT `SatelliteAssembliesTests.CheckThatSatelliteAssembliesAreNotAOTed` failing #90458
    8.0.0
  • Allow Composite ReadyToRun to be used with framework-dependent deployment #90454
  • Assert failure: brick_table[b] != 0 #90452
  • Assert failure: (g_gc_lowest_address <= address) && (address <= g_gc_highest_address) #90447
  • Update documentation for the Windows thread pool option #90444
    8.0.0
  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the `!ThreadPool` command when using the Windows thread pool #90443
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: g_heaps[h]->committed_by_oh_per_heap[oh] == g_heaps[h]->committed_by_oh_per_heap_refresh[oh] #90442

Closed

  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure `EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateObjectIndexingByNonIntConst` #90354
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure`DebuggerTests.ArrayTests.InspectInlineArray2` #90345
    9.0.0
  • Access violation when passing parameter to native -> managed callback on 32-bit #90462
  • .Net 8 Wasm vs Server Performance #90465
    9.0.0
  • IOS TestFlight Non-public API usage error ITMS-90338 for __dyld_find_unwind_sections using NativeAOT #90408
    8.0.0
  • Perf pipeline completely broken - `No matching distribution found for pip<22.0` #90420
  • [API Proposal]: `Swap()`, a safe way to use external array for building an `ImmutableArray<T>` #90464
  • JIT: Deep inlining of polymorphic recursion can cause hangs during JIT #90144
    8.0.0
  • Some incorrect NRT annotations in System.CodeDom #78036
    8.0.0
  • F1 on our source generator errors goes nowhere because we don't set a HelpUri #85181
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add appropriate telemetry flags to track use of NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #88844
    9.0.0
  • [Proposal] Introduce a transpilable C# language/.NET runtime subset specialized for native library wrappers #90397

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add a head merging pass #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Change how toggle refs are reported in gcdump #90467
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • gen0_bricks_cleared flag needs to be propagated when we change heap count #90457
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90456
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • improve handling of LLA in Quic #90455
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run trimming tests for global.json changes #90451
    needs-area-label
  • Fix ilasm casting #90450
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Fix NullableAttribute illink test failures #90449
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix TimeProvider Test #90448
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90446
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make MemberInfoCache`1<System.__Canon>.AddMethod prejittable #90441
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Disable some tests on Firefox #90347
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Don't build samples in parallel on CI #90470
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Do not use private APIs on iOS/macOS #90430
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix condition for setting if symbol is a file in native AOT publish targets #90438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed Enumerator variable null check #89920
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Remove experimental off of librarybuilder workload #90410
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Prevent generic context runaway during inlining of polymorphic recursive methods #90306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update DNNE #90425
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove all use of <Nullable>annotations</Nullable> #90401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Add DiagnosticDescriptorHelper to set HelpURI for generator / analyzer diagnostics #90353
    area-Meta
  • [workloads] Add telemetry for mobile and wasm workloads #90208
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • JIT: Unspill normalize-on-load variables using exact small type #90318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Add more blazor tests for InvariantGlobalization #90440
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • [browser] smaller prefetch file set #90388
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable callconv and classloader runtime tests #90421
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • TypeLoadException thrown from MetadataLoadContext should expose TypeName #90268
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixing COM Aggregation and XAML reference tracking on .NET AOT #90283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use TCP transport for EventPipe on mobile platforms #90315
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • support SslStream SSLKEYLOGFILE in debug builds #90429
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • Disallow readonly instance fields in InlineArray structs #90262
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #90049
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement Edit and Continue on Linux and MacOS #90349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • DCS work nicely with collectible AssemblyLoadContext #90437
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature request]: An option to opt-in for internal API analysis for `IDE0051` (Remove unused private member) #69483
  • InvalidOperationException from CSharpInitializeMemberFromPrimaryConstructorParameterCodeRefactoringProvider #69481
  • EnC: Emit array and UTF8 literals using FieldRva #69480
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot Get Test Project to Load Changes in a SG-Based Project #69423
  • Honor DoesNotReturn attribute #69486

PullRequests

Created

  • React to csharplang changes #69487
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries #50039
  • Curious Blazor (Server) Behavior with Html Table Containing Input Elements #50038
  • MapIdentityApi throws a System.ArgumentException when a user has multiple roles #50037
  • RemoteAuthenticationHandler.Options.CallbackPath does not match Request.Path (redirect_uri) with Blazor deployed on Nginx #50036
  • Conditional css class syntax in blazor #50035
  • CascadingValueSource doesn't work with named AddCascadingValue #50034
  • An existing connection was forcibly closed by remote host on AppShell #50033
  • Blazor Web App Template - website after publish to local IIS fails to load #50032

Closed

  • Perf regression: mvc #49984
  • SaveToken on JwtBearer Authentication Handler doesn't work if TokenValidated Event Sets Result #49769
  • Support certificate auto-rotation in Kestrel #32351
    8.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [Blazor] Manual reflection based page discovery #49757
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Synchronize KestrelTrace next-id comments #49964
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Watch file-based certificates for changes #49979
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Extend `PersistKeysToDbContext` (#49329) #50011
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2242159 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Set form options for form-based request types #50016
    area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 7 MAUI Buttons IsVisible=true don't display them after upd. Image element many times on Android #16718
  • ImageButton Command behaves different from Button Comman when navigating to a map view in .Net MAUI #16716
  • MessagingCenter is now internal in .net 8 #16714
  • ImageButton Padding not working when manipulate IsVisible On Android #16713
  • Step Counter API #16712
  • Border + RefreshView will let ScrollView no SizeChanged after update to net8 preview7 #16711

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the new device runners #16719

Updated

  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in WindowOverlay #16700
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Batch command #31455
  • Automatically query all data from DbSets in the order within the DbContext after calling SaveChanges #31452
  • How is DbContext resolved at design-time in new ASP.NET Core projects? #31451
  • Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.Data.SqlClient, Version=5.0.0.0 .NET 7 Azure AppService Linux #31450
  • Cancelled token does not prevent execution of ExecuteDeleteAsync(token) #31448

Closed

  • EF Core 7.0.10 - 'Invalid Object Name' error when using DbFunction #31456

PullRequests

Created

  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
  • Initial change tracking and DetectChanges for complex types #31453
  • Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449
